name: naviscroll
description: A small package to create a navigation component from sections of a website and track which one is in view

scripts.build: curl -X POST -s --data-urlencode 'input@src/naviscroll.js' https://javascript-minifier.com/raw > index.js && curl -X POST -s --data-urlencode 'input@src/naviscroll.umd.js' https://javascript-minifier.com/raw > naviscroll.umd.js

author: Troshin Alex
